TopicTitle: Looking for a specific mod functionality.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys.

The mod I want is simply to be able speed up the game while under acceleration. These 30 minute manuevers with my Dawn motor is killing me. Does anyone know of any such mod? I aint really interested in any others untill I have done all there is to do in the standard game.

Cheers
You might check out this mod PersistentThrust http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133735-WIP-1-0-4-PersistentThrust-v1-0-3-alpha
